step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well raising your hands. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you move your hands behind your head.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. Keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
You're returning to the start position. Try to maintain straighter wrists as you bring your hands back down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and your elbows closer as you bring your hands up. Continue to focus on spreading your elbows wide and keeping your head upright.
